definitions.text: divide society into social classes or castes
examples: Income distribution often stratifies a society

definitions.text: develop different social levels, classes, or castes
examples: Society stratifies when the income gap widens

definitions.text: form, arrange, or deposit in layers
examples: The fish are stratified in barrels
The rock was stratified by the force of the water
A statistician stratifies the list of names according to the addresses

definitions.text: render fertile and preserve by placing between layers of earth or sand
arranged in a sequence of grades or ranks
deposited or arranged in horizontal layers

examples: American society is becoming increasingly stratified
